author: Paul Irving
title: The Epidemic of Loneliness–and How to Combat It
text: is chairman of the Center for the Future of Aging at the Milken Institute, chairman of Encore.org, and Distinguished Scholar in Residence at the University of Southern California Davis School of Gerontology. Loneliness is a recurring theme in classic songs, from Elvis Presley’s “Are You Lonesome Tonight” to “Hank Williams’ “I’m So Lonesome I Could   Retirement Insurance Products Are Disappearing. And That’s Dangerous.
